title: Cairo Five-Star Kempinski Palace Escape with Eight Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description:
Our five-star luxury city hotel is the ultimate destination for your business trip or family getaway in sunny Cairo.

Welcome to Royal Maxim Palace Kempinski, a distinguished destination in the heart of New Cairo and the ideal getaway for both business and leisure guests. Our 5-star luxury hotel in Cairo embraces a haven of serenity, featuring the finest facilities coupled with the highest levels of services.

The hotel is uniquely located minutes away from the newly business and commercial districts in the area, where we ensure you bask in a marvelous experience worth a lifetime.

Accompanied by the world-class European Resense Spa, the property holds 245 rooms and suites, presenting elegant fittings and furnishings with overwhelming views suitable for every taste. Upgrading your stay, visit one of our 8 exceptional restaurants and bars, and treat yourself to a blissful culinary experience all around the world in one place. The unparalleled architecture of the landmark extends to our dedicated banquet floor, including 11 customizable meeting spaces and the largest ballroom in Cairo.

title: Grand Five-Star Cairo Oasis with Extravagant Pool & Nine Onsite Restaurants
description: Escape to the world of the pharaohs and stay in Egypt's grand five-star InterContinental Citystars Cairo, an IHG Hotel. This central retreat offers luxurious pools to escape the Egyptian heat and nine onsite restaurants and bars, providing diverse dining experiences to suit any appetite. Using this hotel as a launchpad, follow the footsteps of the ancient Egyptians and discover the alluring history of the pyramids, crypts, mosques and museums.
location_description: InterContinental Citystars Cairo, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Omar Ibn El Khattab Street, Heliopolis Bahary, Cairo, 11737, Egypt

title: Contemporary Cairo Landmark Escape with Three Restaurants & Outdoor Terrace
description: Combine upscale comfort with modern luxury at Crowne Plaza West Cairo Arkan, an IHG Hotel, a recently opened haven of classical grandeur in the heart of the city. Part of the world-renowned Crowne Plaza brand, this premium retreat perfectly encapsulates the spirit of Cairo with your wellbeing in mind. Discover outstanding amenities, including an impressive selection of dining options, a fully-equipped fitness room, outdoor pool, and impeccable, personalised service.
location_description: Crowne Plaza West Cairo Arkan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Plot 29, Arkan Plaza, Zayed Entrance 2, Cairo, 12588, Egypt

vendor_name: Kempinski Nile Hotel Garden City Cairo
title: Cairo Five-Star Kempinski Oasis with Rooftop Pool Overlooking the Nile
description: If youâ€™re looking for the ultimate Egyptian sanctuary, the magical, five-star Kempinski Nile Hotel Garden City Cairo has it all, including views over the revered Nile River and a superb location within downtown Cairo. Offering guests a charming blend of old-world European luxury and vibrant Egyptian hospitality, the hotel is the perfect base for those wishing to explore ancient wonders, including marvellous mummies and the Pyramids of Giza among other fascinating sights. With five restaurants and lounges, a luxe spa and a pool boasting spectacular views, this is an idyllic taste of Kempinski luxury in one of the world's most vibrant and exciting cities.
location_description: Kempinski Nile Hotel Garden City Cairo
offer_address: 12 Ahmed Ragheb, Qasr El Nil, Cairo Governorate 4272050, Egypt

title: Cairo Five-Star Luxury Overlooking the Nile
description: Combine the perfect location with world-renowned luxury at the InterContinental Cairo Semiramis, an IHG Hotel, located on the banks of the Nile. Relax in unparalleled comfort with easy access to the pyramids, while the exciting bazaars of old Cairo are located just steps from your front door. After days spent exploring ancient wonders, return for a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool, while the spa stands ready to pamper you.
location_description: InterContinental Cairo Semiramis, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Nile Corniche, Qasr Ad Dobarah, El Nil, Cairo Governorate 11511, Egypt

title: Cairo Nile Riverfront Indulgence with Six Restaurants, Four Bars & Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the perfect fusion of modern sophistication and ancient wonder at this towering five-star Fairmont retreat, ideally perched along the banks of the River Nile.

Striking a picture of allure against the Cairo skyline and boasting a rooftop pool offering panoramic views of the Great Pyramid of Giza on the horizon, the hotel exudes Egyptian charm and luxury.

You can spend your days unwinding in the plush, well-appointed rooms or embark on a gastronomic journey across the hotel's six dining venues, or savour a cocktail at the onsite bars. If you're looking to destress, head to the lavish Fairmont Spa for restorative treatments.
offer_address: Nile City Towers 2005 B, Corniche El Nil, Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466, Egypt
